_comment: MA3 Visualization Tab Feedback Messages - Instructors can edit these
BIN_ALL_CORRECT: [OK] Bin table formulas are all correct (Min, Max, Width).
BIN_NONE_CORRECT: [X] No correct bin table formulas found.
BIN_MIN_OK: [ok] E22: Bin Min formula correct (uses MIN function).
BIN_MIN_WRONG: [x] E22: Bin Min formula incorrect. Expected MIN function referencing difference data.
BIN_MAX_OK: [ok] E23: Bin Max formula correct (uses MAX function).
BIN_MAX_WRONG: [x] E23: Bin Max formula incorrect. Expected MAX function referencing difference data.
BIN_WIDTH_WRONG: [x] E24: Bin Width formula incorrect. Expected (Max-Min)/number_of_bins calculation.
FREQ_LIMITS_ALL_CORRECT: [OK] All Lower Limit and Upper Limit formulas are correct.
FREQ_LIMITS_NONE_CORRECT: [X] No correct Lower/Upper Limit formulas found.
FREQ_UPPER_WRONG: [x] {cell}: Upper Limit formula incorrect. Expected previous upper limit + bin width.
FREQ_DIST_ALL_CORRECT: [OK] All Title of Bin, Frequency, and Relative Frequency formulas are correct.
FREQ_DIST_NONE_CORRECT: [X] No correct Frequency Distribution formulas found.
FREQ_TITLE_OK: [ok] {cell}: Title of Bin formula correct (midpoint calculation).
FREQ_TITLE_WRONG: [x] {cell}: Title of Bin formula incorrect. Expected (Lower+Upper)/2.
FREQ_COUNT_WRONG: [x] {cell}: Frequency formula incorrect. Expected COUNTIF, COUNTIFS, or FREQUENCY function.
FREQ_REL_WRONG: [x] {cell}: Relative Frequency formula incorrect. Expected frequency/total calculation.
HIST_ALL_CORRECT: [OK] Histogram is present with correct data, chart title, and axis titles.
HIST_MISSING: [X] No histogram/bar chart found on Visualization tab.
HIST_FOUND: [ok] Bar chart found on Visualization tab.
HIST_WRONG_TYPE: [x] Chart found but is not a bar chart type.
HIST_DATA_OK: [ok] Chart uses correct data range for Frequency values.
HIST_DATA_WRONG: [x] Chart data range incorrect. Expected Frequency column (G28:G38 or similar).
HIST_DATA_MISSING: [x] Could not verify chart data range.
HIST_LABELS_OK: [ok] Chart uses Title of Bin column for category labels.
HIST_LABELS_WRONG: [x] Chart category labels incorrect. Expected Title of Bin column (F28:F38 or similar).
